author: Discovery
description:
Season 10 of BattleBots kicks off with nonstop and intense action! Don't miss the best battle altering moments as Witch Doctor faces Hydra, Black Dragon joins the fray, Whiplash battles Gruff, Rusty Rusty takes on a deadly trio and many more wild battles. Who has what it takes to win the Giant Nut?

Don't miss #Battlebots Thursdays at 8P on Discovery!

#Discovery

Stream Full Episodes of BattleBots:
https://www.discovery.com/shows/battlebots

About BattleBots:
These are the next generation robots from all corners of the globe trading blows to reign supreme. Each match consists of two robots competing in a single three-minute bout in which the goal is to destroy or disable the opponent. If there is no knockout during the battle, a panel of judges declare the winner. The series highlights the design and build of each robot, bot-builder backstories and the pursuit of the BattleBots championship.


Subscribe to Discovery:
https://www.youtube.com/@discovery
